document_data.name: Elklund Oromanche
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/417/Eye on the Realms: The Sword of Spells|27}}{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.siblings: [[Maerele Oromanche]], [[Imraphar Oromanche]], [[Odyle Oromanche]], [[Olora Oromanche]], [[Emruelle Oromanche]], and [[Haladeira Oromanche]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Elklund Oromanche''' was one of the many [[Oromanche]] siblings of a prominent [[Mosstonian]] merchant family in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Every member of the Oromanche family was described to have "dark, lush good looks," which made the family lush with rumors of and well-publicized trysts. The family was known for being flamboyant and grand individuals.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, the Oromanche clan was one of the most successful merchant organizations in [[Tethyr]] and the town of Mosstone. [[Maerele Oromanche]] was the matriarch of the clan and the oldest sibling. The rest brothers and sisters were much younger including [[Odyle Oromanche|Odyle]], [[Imraphar Oromanche|Imraphar]], [[Olora Oromanche|Olora]], [[Emruelle Oromanche|Emruelle]], and [[Haladeira Oromanche|Haladeira]]. Most contributed to the family's mercantile activities. [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]] had a warm relationship with the family, but his attitude towards Elklund Oromanche was notably cold.
